v1.1.0 â€” Spectator Mode, Door Unboxing & More
âœ¨ New Features:
â€¢ Gacha Spectator Mode: All connected players watch gacha reveals in real-time. Sequential card-by-card reveals are socket-synced â€” spectators advance automatically when the puller clicks Next.
â€¢ Puzzle Spectator Mode: When a player solves a puzzle, other players see a floating overlay with live progress. Supports all five puzzle types.
â€¢ Door Unboxing: Lock any door wall behind a puzzle. Players must solve it to open the door. Includes per-door sounds and a GM relock button.
â€¢ Per-Item Delivery Mode: Each tile item can be set to Stack (add to existing quantity) or Individual (create a separate item document). Essential for D&D 5e and PF2e.
â€¢ Live Remaining Count Badge: The Ã—N badge updates in real-time to show actual remaining quantity.
â€¢ Cinematic Cut-In: Everyone (In Dialog): New gacha mode â€” cut-in plays inside the reveal dialog for all players simultaneously.
â€¢ Disable Update Notifications: Toggle off update popups in Module Settings.
ğŸ› Bug Fixes:
â€¢ Tile Item Take Failing for Players: Fixed a critical bug where non-GM players could not take items from tile containers.
â€¢ False Success Notification: Item claim notifications now only show after server confirmation.
